articles.description: Arizona's top court ruled that a strict 160-year-old ban on abortion may be enforced.
articles.title: Arizona Supreme Court reinstates near-total abortion ban from 1864

articles.description: The parents of Ethan Crumbley, a Michigan school shooter, were sentenced to at least 10 years in prison.
articles.title: Ethan Crumbley: Parents of Michigan school gunman sentenced to at least 10 years

articles.description: Boeing shares dropped almost 2% after concerns were raised over its 787 and 777 jets.
articles.title: Boeing hit after new whistleblower raises safety concerns

articles.description: Four people have died and several are missing after a fire at a hydroelectric plant near Bologna.
articles.title: Italian explosion: Search after deadly blast at power plant

articles.title: Idaho teen accused of planning church attacks in loyalty to Islamic State

articles.description: Aimee Harris received a month in prison for selling writings by President Biden's daughter to a conservative group.
articles.title: US woman who stole Ashley Biden's diary sentenced to a month in prison

articles.description: The Australian exhibit denied men entry in a bid to highlight misogyny. A man sued for access and won.
articles.title: Mona: Court rules women’s-only exhibit must allow male visitors

articles.description: Benjamin Netanyahu and Yahya Sinwar remain far apart on key issues after six months of war.
articles.title: Can US pressure deliver Israel-Hamas truce in Gaza?

articles.description: The European Court of Human Rights ruled that a group of Swiss women partially won their climate case.
articles.title: European court rules human rights violated by climate inaction

articles.description: The renowned scientist came up with revolutionary ideas in the 1960s, sparking a 50-year search for evidence.
articles.title: Peter Higgs obituary: the shy man who changed our understanding of the Universe
